sections.heading: proceedings; redemption; subsequent taxes paid; conditions
sections.text: (1) Any person entitled to redeem real property may do so at any time prior to the institution of foreclosure proceedings by paying the county treasurer for the use of such holder of a tax sale certificate or his or her heirs or assigns the

sections.heading: requires an individual to act pursuant to this section in order to redeem property during the pendency of a foreclosure action
